title: 2022 Around the AFC in 48 Minutes
itunes:title: 2022 Around the AFC in 48 Minutes
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Cynthia Frelund start by discussing DeAndre Hopkins' suspension for violating the NFL's policy on the use of performance-enhancing drugs, as well as Tyrann Mathieu's return to his hometown after signing with the New Orleans Saints. Then, the heroes go around the AFC in 48 minutes, 3 minutes per team, division by division, beginning with the AFC East. After a tour around the AFC North, we visit the AFC South, and finally wrap up the episode with the ultra-competitive AFC West.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
